title: 安田記念の後に・負けてばばんばー

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... I couldn't reach her!
Ikuno's gotten so strong~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Yeah, but, next time!
I'll train what I need and do my best next time!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ...Tannhauser-san.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for today,
Tannhauser-san.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: What's up, getting all formal~.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
...For this 'Yasuda Kinen',
I was in perfect condition to take it on.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
The result was satisfactory.
But I also felt that complacency is forbidden.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
I could feel you catching up right away,
that's the kind of race it was.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Until next time, I look forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Hehe. I see. Kinda makes me blush.
Same here, looking forward to next time too.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
By the way, there's a place I'd like to stop by on the way back,
if that's alright?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: What's that?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: A super sento.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Sento baths offer relaxation effects from multiple aspects,
such as thermotherapy and hydrostatic pressure.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
In other words, 'heal when tired'.
This cycle leads to future health.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: O-oh, I see!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Then let's go right away.
Long baths are counterproductive, so within reasonable limits.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haaah~~, it's so warm.
I'm all toasty from the core~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I think I'll sleep well tonight...
Hwaah~.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, that's good to hear.
...Please don't fall asleep here, okay?
In any case, the two of them warmed up both body and soul at the sento, recharging for what came next.
